page.title: 15Family Life:Peter Tavy Area
page.content: Most people living here were not born in this area.The main reason that they came here was because some of their families were now living in this area. A few people came here for work.Some people came because they wanted to get away from the city,some retired here and one person inherited a house.The average family had two parents and some children.Most school-age children go to Tavistock schools,but two go to Plymouth and one goes to a ballet school in Surrey.All the school-age children wear school uniform.The most popular out of school wear was jeans and sweat shirts.Most people in the area had pets,the most popular being dogs and cats but some people had Guinea Pigs and rabbits.
